title: Full Bore v2.01 - FAS [VIPER666]
description:
--===VIPER666===--

Crack provided by FAS.

Deep underground lies a reminder of Boarkind's darkest hours. All it takes
is one little boar to dig it back up. A block puzzler with an exploratory
twist, Full Bore throws the player into an open world filled with crumbling
mines, arcane ruins, and technological wonders with only curiosity to lead
the way. This world is packed to the brim with secrets and hidden rooms,
because when everything is made of blocks, puzzles could be anywhere.
 <a href="
http://store.steampowered.com/app/264060/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://store.steampowered.com/app/264060/</a>

Features:
~~~~~~~~~
- A visually engaging world that will have you hunting for story scraps and
secrets.
- Explore the world at your own pace as you learn how each block works.
- 16-bit-era pixel art with modern lighting sets a unique mood.
- Fantastic blues-inspired soundtrack by Miguel Acuna and the Adjective
Plural Noun.
- Focus on puzzle solving and exploration, not conflict.

1.Extract
2.Run 'Install Full Bore 2.01.exe' to install the game
3.Play

--===VIPER666===--
